attributes.action: establish a new national holiday, to be called Fenella Fielding Day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the womenfolk of England shall on this day undertake to speak, dress, coiff and smoke like La Fielding herself. This will boost our flagging birthrate, tutor slouched youth in the ways of deportment, improve our fraught relations with the fine, tobacco-curing nations of Virginia and the Near East, and put paid to the common foreign prejudice that all the daughters of Albion are lobster-hued, over-amplified lushes.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
